title: GIVE EVELYNN A NEW SKIN
body: I've been begging for a new Evelynn skin ever since her rework, but nothings happened. Having even heard Riot mention Evelynn. Evelynn is one of my favorite champs and I love playing her. It would be nice to get a new skin for her rework. I think Riot isn't prioritizing champion skins very well. Rumble needed a new skin, thumbs up you got one down, but you really need to focus on champs in need instead of making skins that "fit the bill" and calling it good. Aurelion Sol, Urgot, Kled (not as much but still), Taliyah, Evelynn all need new skins more than any other champ. Anyways, I know Riot appreciates some opinion from players.
